column1: 321211,Motor Mechanic (General),,"Inspect mechanical components of vehicles to identify problems
column3: Replace or repair non-engine automotive or vehicle components
column7: Inspect vehicles to determine overall condition
column11: Operate transportation equipment to demonstrate function or malfunction
column15: Confer with customers or users to assess problems
column17: Repair worn, damaged, or defective mechanical parts
column19: Confer with co-workers or internal stakeholders to coordinate operational activities
column21: Read work orders or descriptions of problems to determine repairs or modifications needed
column25: Test mechanical systems to ensure proper functioning
column27: Replace worn, damaged or defective mechanical parts
column31: Service heating, ventilation or air-conditioning (HVAC) systems or components
column33: Disassemble equipment for maintenance or repair
column35: Adjust vehicle components according to specifications
column37: Disassemble equipment to inspect for deficiencies
